```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

### combine all the dataset
```{r}
clustered_dfAMPeak_FtUnion <- read_rds("data/clustered_dfAMPeak_FtUnion.rds") %>% mutate(Corrdior = "FtUnion")
clustered_dfMidDay_FtUnion <- read_rds("data/clustered_dfMidDay_FtUnion.rds") %>% mutate(Corrdior = "FtUnion")
clustered_dfAMPeak_800N <- read_rds("data/clustered_dfAMPeak_800N.rds") %>% mutate(Corrdior = "800N")
clustered_dfMidDay_800N <- read_rds("data/clustered_dfMidDay_800N.rds") %>% mutate(Corrdior = "800N")
clustered_dfAMPeak_StateSt <- read_rds("data/clustered_dfAMPeak_StateSt.rds") %>% mutate(Corrdior = "StateSt")
clustered_dfMidDay_StateSt <- read_rds("data/clustered_dfMidDay_StateSt.rds") %>% mutate(Corrdior = "StateSt")

dfCorridors <- rbind(clustered_dfAMPeak_FtUnion, clustered_dfAMPeak_800N, clustered_dfAMPeak_StateSt, clustered_dfMidDay_FtUnion, clustered_dfMidDay_800N, clustered_dfMidDay_StateSt) %>%
  write_rds("data/dfCorridors.rds")
```
